for -row written instructions pattern download the dk weight version of this hat pattern https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/snowbird-hat-5 brim with smaller needle co 56 sts using longtail tubular cast on join in the round and place bor marker round 1 k1 p1 28 times work round 1 until work measures 2 /5 cm from co switch to larger needle this needle will be used for the rest of the hat hat round 1 k3 p1 14 times round 2 repeat round 1 round 3 1/2 rc p1 1/2 lc p1 7 times round 4 repeat round 1 repeat rnds 1-4 until work measures approximately 8 /20 cm from bottom of folded edge or 1/2 /1 cm from your desired hat depth be sure to end on row 4 decrease hat note switch to dpn s when needed round 1 k1 k2tog p1 ssk k1 p1 7 times 42 sts round 2 k2tog p1 ssk p1 7 times 28 sts remove marker slip 2 sts purlwise wyib pm for new bor download the matching shawl pattern https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/snowbird-blanket-shawl round 3 k3tog p1 7 times 14 sts finishing break yarn and pull through all remaining sts on needle se- cure with a knot in the inside of the hat weave in ends and block to finished measurements pg 2 hat can be blocked laying flat or over a ballon
